blur_detection.description: The invoice image is sharp with clear text and well-defined edges throughout.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image has excellent sharpness suitable for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The invoice displays excellent contrast with blue text on white background making all content clearly legible.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No action needed as contrast is optimal for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: No glare, reflections, or overexposed areas are present in the invoice image.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the image is free from glare effects.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or liquid damage is visible on the invoice document.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The invoice appears to be free from tears, creases, folds, or wrinkles that would affect readability.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the document shows no signs of physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the invoice are clearly visible with no content appearing to be cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the entire document is properly captured in the image.

missing_sections.description: The invoice appears complete with all standard sections present including header, line items, totals, and payment information.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all expected invoice sections are present and complete.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other objects are obstructing any part of the invoice content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from obstructions.
